title: Panoptic Insights: May Newsletter
description: Explore the May edition of the Panoptic Newsletter for insights into DeFi-native options, the uptick in BTC option trades, volatility implied by Uniswap liquidity, and more!

title: Closing a Position
description: This guide provides insights on efficiently closing positions in Panoptic, covering when to close, how to do it, and troubleshooting issues to secure gains or limit losses in DeFi options trading.

title: Panoptic Insights: April Newsletter
description: Upcoming Bitcoin ETF options approval, key expiry dates, highlights from the ETH Denver summit, and more!

title: Panoptic Launches Comprehensive Code4rena Audit for Enhanced Security
description: Panoptic launches its second audit with Code4rena to secure the DeFi options protocol.

title: Panoptic at ETH Denver 2024
description: Read our ETH Denver 2024 recap. Panoptic hosted the DeFi Derivatives Summit where thought leaders from dYdX, Aevo, Wintermute, GSR, zkSync, and others spoke on the future of derivatives.
